guide.title: Quick Guide
guide.step1: Select or copy the prompt you want to analyze
guide.step3: Review the GOLDEN score and 3 improved versions
guide.step4: Click [Copy] or [Apply] on your favorite version
guide.trayTip: Double-click tray: Instantly analyze clipboard content

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.alwaysOnTopDesc: Keep analysis window above other windows
behavior.hideOnCopyDesc: Automatically close window after copying improved prompt
behavior.conflictWarning: "Always on top" and "Hide after copy" are both enabled. Window won't be on top after reopening.
behavior.autoShowWindowDesc: Automatically show window when analysis completes
behavior.showNotificationsDesc: Get macOS notifications for analysis completion, errors, etc.

smart.title: Smart Features
smart.clipboardWatchDesc: Show • indicator in tray when prompt is copied
smart.autoAnalyzeDesc: Analyze immediately on detection (no tray click needed)
smart.aiContextPopupDesc: Floating button when using Claude, ChatGPT
smart.aiContextPopupWarning: ⚠️ May interfere while typing - enable only when needed

autoApply.title: Auto Apply
autoApply.description: Click [Apply] to automatically replace the original text in the source app (Claude, ChatGPT, etc.).
autoApply.note: ※ Some apps (VS Code, Cursor) require manual paste after copy

ghostBar.title: Ghost Bar
ghostBar.description: When you copy a prompt, a small floating bar appears near your cursor. Press Enter or click to instantly apply the improved version. Reduces the workflow from 5 steps to 2.
ghostBar.enableDesc: Show floating bar after copying prompts
ghostBar.autoPasteDesc: Automatically paste improved text back to source app
ghostBar.dismissTimeoutDesc: Time before Ghost Bar automatically hides

shortcut.title: Shortcut Key
shortcut.description: Changes apply immediately. Try the recommended shortcut if there's a conflict.

captureMode.title: Text Capture Mode
captureMode.autoDesc: Try selected text first, fall back to clipboard
captureMode.selectionDesc: Only analyze mouse-selected text (no Cmd+C needed)
captureMode.clipboardDesc: Must copy with Cmd+C before pressing shortcut

aiProvider.title: AI Provider
aiProvider.description: Select your AI service for enhanced analysis
aiProvider.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check your API key.

providers.title: AI Providers
providers.noProvidersHint: Click + Add above to register a provider
providers.fallbackDescription: If primary provider fails, automatically switch to next provider.
providers.localStorageNote: All API keys are stored locally only (no server transmission)
